text:
Hey everyone,

The Growth Team at <https://www.lean-labs.com/|Lean Labs> and <https://www.sprocketrocket.co/|Sprocket Rocket> is hiring a front-end developer.

Full-time & fully remote.

You can find the <https://www.lean-labs.com/careers/front-end-developer-0?utm_campaign=Job%20Applicant&utm_source=Slack&utm_medium=HS%20Dev%20Slack%20Posting|description and application details here>.

Feel free to ask any questions here.

Hi Chris, I'm not currently searching for a new role but I was looking through some of the work you and your team have done.  I just wanted to say you all seem to produce some excellent work!  I'd love to connect on LinkedIn.
